title: Key Strategies
text1: We believe everyone deserves a great place to live, work and learn. To ensure this is possible, we are steering towards improved advocacy for members of our communities who are notably disregarded by the systems in place to cultivate a thriving society for all.
list: Continue our consultation services for Koreans in Alabama and expand to language access services for other limited English-proficiency individuals or organizations

Increase the breadth of organizations utilizing A-KEEPâ€™s assistance for workforce consultation, recruitment and training to eliminate cultural misunderstandings in the workplace and open opportunities for employment
Pilot a certificate conversion program to sponsor global students and professions seeking gainful employment in the U.S.
